title: Mahindra Holidays to invest Rs 1000 crore in Uttarakhand
description: Mahindra Holidays & Resorts has signed an MOU with the government of Uttarakhand to invest Rs 1000 crore in building four to five resorts over the next few years in the state. The company aims to become a strategic partner of the state and expand its key count from 5000 to 10,000 by 2030.
